overview:
Sha Sykes is President of OAllah Entertainment Inc., a management and consulting company that provides people with development planning for their future. She also is co-founder of World-Alliance-Records LLC, an independent record label, and Executive Producer for EBM Productions.

She consults with executives from a variety of fields to help create solutions to positively influence the world’s future. She previously worked as 2nd Personal Assistant and A&R in support of Bert Padell (PNFW-Padell Nadell Fine & Weinberger) and Liz Martucci where she was responsible for discovering and developing new talent and initiatives that involved the relationships between the record label executives and the artists as well as the financial management accounts and corporations.

For the past three years she has been on the Events Committee of VABC-Voices Against Brain Cancer and the Assistant Director of Development for Nickelodeon Sports Foundation, also known as Iron Man Sports.

milestones.description: World Alliance Records Artists "FarFetched" released smash HIT "The CURE" VABC.
